name: Snailed It! (dreamlogician)
description:
"Snailed It!" is a cooperative snail platformer for two players. Work together with your fellow snail to navigate the environments and reach the goal, while keeping each other safe in the process.

Controls:

[Green Snail]
W - Jet
A - Move left
D - Move right

[Orange Snail]
Up Arrow Key - Jet
Left Arrow Key - Move left
Right Arrow Key - Move right

To fullscreen the game, click the icon in the lower right of the game window

Credits:

Created by Jamey Stevenson (dreamlogician)
